extendedInfo.description: The official travel app of the Illinois Office of Tourism, Enjoy Illinois is your comprehensive tour guide for discovering the magnificence of Illinois in every mile. Now you can plan trips with more than 10,000 attractions at your fingertips, and use the app as a pocket tour guide to make the most out of your trip while you're here. It will also point out local discoveries you may have never known existed. With its robust content and GPS-driven features, Enjoy Illinois gives you an easy way to experience Illinois, while making sure you donât miss a thing along the way.FeaturesNEAR ME: Tap âNear Meâ to see attractions near your location that can be filtered by interest to reveal hidden gems worth a visit. BROWSE BY INTEREST: Filter over 10,000 attractions in seconds for travel inspirations categorized by dining, shopping, nightlife and more.BROWSE BY REGION: Explore the regions of Illinois by tapping a map to discover each areaâs top cities and attractions.MY TRIPS: Create a detailed itinerary of your trip that can be accessed later, even without a data connection.EVENTS: Discover festivals and events happening around you.DEALS: Find money-saving deals throughout Illinois on everything from hotels to dining.SHARE: Connect with Facebook, Twitter or e-mail to share your itinerary and post info on the attractions youâre visiting.
